title: Electrospun EVOH/AST-120 hybrid nanofiber membranes for removal of indoxyl sulfate from blood
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26596-26603
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04501G, Paper

Makoto Sasaki, Rieko Hirata, Ayano Konagai, Mitsuhiro Ebara
Nanofibers containing activated carbon using poly(ethylene-co-vinyl alcohol) (EVOH) were prepared to remove indoxyl sulfate (IS) from the blood.
